name: The Barber
flavorText: A precision instrument for a master of the blade.
flavorTextHtml: A precision instrument for a master of the blade.

secondary.textHtml: Instead of dealing direct damage, your Spirit Barrage now accumulates on the target. When you stop casting, it explodes dealing 428% of the accumulated damage to all enemies within 15 yards. (Witch Doctor Only) [400 - 500]%
